message:
有兴趣的演出太多，钱包太瘪，还经常后知后觉，面对售完相见恨晚。
我先马克几条。

My Neighbour Totoro

Spirited Away
The European premiere of Studio Ghibli’s Oscar-winning film, re-imagined for the stage. Performed in Japanese with English translation visible from all seats.
30 Apr–24 Aug 2024
title: 英国在住们，一起分享最近有兴趣的展览/舞台剧/演唱会吧0v0
